name: Dictator Academy
description:
Dictator Academy

Kim Jung One, recently elected as Supreme Leader of the Koreo nation, is training himself to invade the world.

Your orders affect every single soldiers under your command. Find a way to destroy all targets at once !  

11 Levels are at your disposal, feel free to skip if you find some of them too difficult.

Enjoy !

Made By

Alexandre Blanchet - Programmer

Gabriel Simard - Programmer 

William Dery - Programmer

Frederic Bessette - Game Designer

Vincent Arnal - 2D Artist

Free to use commercially assets (mostly audio) were use in this game.

Music from https://filmmusic.io/ "Dangerous" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com/) License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)

Music from https://filmmusic.io/ "Pop Goes the Weasel" by Kevin MacLeod (https://incompetech.com/) License: CC BY (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/)
